isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - REMOVE - WIPER MOTOR

note.para: The electric wiper motor is not serviceable and is replaced as a unit.

svcprocinfo.para: The wiper motor is part of the windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 2, Figure 87) or (Item 2, Figure 88) or (Item 2, Figure 89) mounted on the engine side of the cowl under the cowl tray and engine air intake box assembly.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Wiper Motor on Vehicles before 2002 Engines and after 2002 Engines before January 2005

step1.para:
Remove windshield wiper arm and blade assemblies. Refer to
WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY
, Remove Windshield Wiper Arm and Blade Assembly.

Remove cowl tray. Refer to
COWL TRAY
, Remove Cowl Tray.

Remove air duct inlet. Refer to
AIR DUCT INLET
, Remove Air Duct Inlet.

Remove windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly from engine side of cowl. Refer to
WINDSHIELD WIPER MOTOR, BRACKET AND LINKAGE ASSEMBLY
, Remove Windshield Wiper Motor, Bracket and Linkage Assembly.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 90 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: With windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 1) on a clean, dry work surface, remove E-Clip retainer (Item 2) securing wiper linkage (Item 3) to wiper motor pivot arm (Item 4), then remove flat washer (Item 5), wiper linkage (Item 3) and flat washer (Item 5) from wiper motor pivot arm.
Remove hex lock nut (Item 6) securing wiper motor pivot arm (Item 4) to motor shaft and remove wiper motor pivot arm from motor shaft.
Remove three hex bolts (Item 7) securing windshield wiper motor (Item 8) to windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 1) and remove windshield wiper motor.

note.para: The third hex bolt (Item 7) is not visible in Figure 90 below, it is accessible after the wiper motor pivot arm (Item 4) was removed.

figure.caption: Figure 90. Windshield Wiper Motor on Vehicles before 2002 Engines and after 2002 Engines before January 2005

svcsubproc.title: Remove Wiper Motor with Electrical Connector part of Pig-Tail Wiring Harness on Vehicles with 2002 Engines after January 2005

step1.para:
Remove windshield wiper arm and blade assemblies. Refer to
WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY
, Remove Windshield Wiper Arm and Blade Assembly.

Remove cowl tray. Refer to
COWL TRAY
, Remove Cowl Tray.

Remove air duct inlet. Refer to
AIR DUCT INLET
, Remove Air Duct Inlet.

Remove windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly from engine side of cowl. Refer to
WINDSHIELD WIPER MOTOR, BRACKET AND LINKAGE ASSEMBLY
, Remove Windshield Wiper Motor, Bracket and Linkage Assembly.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 91 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: With windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 1) on a clean, dry work surface, remove hex flanged lock nut (Item 2) securing wiper motor pivot arm (Item 3) and wiper linkage (Item 4) to motor shaft, then remove wiper motor pivot arm and wiper linkage (Items 3 and 4) from wiper motor shaft.
Remove three hex flanged head bolts (Item 5) securing windshield wiper motor (Item 7) to windshield wiper motor mounting bracket (Item 8) and remove windshield wiper motor.

If the windshield wiper motor mounting bracket (Item 8) is damaged, remove two hex flanged head bolts (Item 6) securing windshield wiper motor mounting bracket to windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly mounting bracket (Item 9) of windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 1) and remove windshield wiper motor mounting bracket (Item 8).

svcsubproc.title: Remove Wiper Motor with Electrical Connector as part of Wiper Motor on Vehicles with 2002 Engines after January 2005

step1.para:
Remove windshield wiper arm and blade assemblies. Refer to
WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY
, Remove Windshield Wiper Arm and Blade Assembly.

Remove cowl tray. Refer to
COWL TRAY
, Remove Cowl Tray.

Remove air duct inlet. Refer to
AIR DUCT INLET
, Remove Air Duct Inlet.

Remove windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly from engine side of cowl. Refer to
WINDSHIELD WIPER MOTOR, BRACKET AND LINKAGE ASSEMBLY
, Remove Windshield Wiper Motor, Bracket and Linkage Assembly.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 92 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: With windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 1) on a clean, dry work surface, using one or two screwdrivers, carefully pry the wiper linkage (Item 3) off the wiper motor pivot arm (Item 2).

note.para: The wiper motor pivot arm (Item 2) is part of the windshield wiper motor (Item 5) and is replaced with the windshield wiper motor.

step1.para: Remove four hex flanged head bolts (Item 4) securing windshield wiper motor (Item 5) to windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly mounting bracket (Item 6) and remove windshield wiper motor.
